00042             function                set_read()
00043             {
00044                   try
00045                   {
00046                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00047                         $id = $Security->get_gp( 'id' , 'integer' , 0 );
00048                         
00049                         $PmsgAlgorithms = get_package( 'pmsg::pmsg_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00050                         $PmsgAlgorithms->set_read( $id );
00051                   }
00052                   catch( Exception $e )
00053                   {
00054                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00055                   }
00056             }

00072             function          send_feedback()
00073             {
00074                   try
00075                   {
00076                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00077                         
00078                         $PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00079                         $Captcha = get_package( 'captcha' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00080                         
00081                         if( $Captcha->validate_captcha( $Security->get_p( 'captcha' , 'command' ) ) )
00082                         {
00083                               $Params = $Security->parse_http_parameters( 'message:string' );
00084                               
00085                               $MessageAccess = get_package( 'pmsg::pmsg_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00086                               $MessageAccess->create( 'guest' , $MessageAccess->get_feedback_admin() , $Params->message );
00087 
00088                               $Security->reset_p( 'message' , '' );
00089                               $PageComposerUtilities->add_success_message( 'feedback_was_sent' );
00090                         }
00091                         else
00092                         {
00093                               $PageComposerUtilities->add_error_message( 'captcha_error' );
00094                         }
00095                   }
00096                   catch( Exception $e )
00097                   {
00098                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00099                   }
00100             }
00101       
00120             function                controller( $Options )
00121             {
00122                   try
00123                   {                       
00124                         $ContextSet = get_package( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00125                         
00126                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_feedback' );
00127                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_read' );
00128                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_cleanup' );
00129                         
00130                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00131                   }
00132                   catch( Exception $e )
00133                   {
00134                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00135                   }
00136             }
